import React, { useReducer } from 'react' import Nontification from '../Login-nontification/Login-nontificaton' import Reducer from '../../Reducer/Login' import InitialState from '../../InitiaState/Login' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const LoginForm = () => { const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(Reducer, InitialState) return (

Login

dispatch({ type: 'UPDATE NAME', payload: e.target.value, }) } /> dispatch({ type: 'UPDATE ROOM', payload: e.target.value, }) } /> dispatch({ type: 'UPDATE PASSWORD', payload: e.target.value, }) } /> state.name && state.password && state.room ? null : e.preventDefault() } to={`/chat`} >
) } export default LoginForm
